title: MS AccessTime()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MS AccessTime()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the current system time:
SELECT CustomerName, 
  Time() AS CurrentTime
FROM Customers;

Definition and Usage
The Time() function returns the current system time.
Syntax
Time()
Parameter Values
None.
Technical Details
Works in:
From Access 2000

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MS AccessTime()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MS AccessTime()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MS AccessTime()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
